com.smarterapp.mobilebrowser
Class RootUtility

java.lang.Object
  com.smarterapp.mobilebrowser.RootUtility

public class RootUtility
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class that checks if the device is rooted. *Note that the methods used to detect a rooted device are not 100% accurate and will not necessarily work on all rooted devices.
